revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DIR-853 |revision=A1 |series=AC1300 |asin= |newegg= |fcc_date=01/19/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=KA2IR853A1 |pcb_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621A |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12805D |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC64M16GP-DI |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7615DN;MEDIATEK, ARM, MT7615DN, 1650-BFSL, ACMSYFFY; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7615DN;MEDIATEK, ARM, MT7615DN, 1650-BFSL, ACMSYFFY; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=5GHz RF Front End Module;Qorvo (RFMD);RFFM4552;Q, 4552, CF75;2; |flags=MU-MIMO, 256QAM, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=dlink-XXXX, |default_user=Admin |oui=80:26:89 |oui_eth=80:26:89 }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''400'''Mbps - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''1300 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1300 MU-MIMO Wi-Fi Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.dlink.ru/r/products/5/2238_b.html}} *Web GUI: http://dlinkrouter.local "DIR-853_A1" and "REV1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :A single [[MediaTek]] MT7615DN chip serves both 2x2:2 radios. The identifier on each of the two Qorvo RFFM4552 5GHz RF FEMs is different :which likely just means that they came from a slightly different batch. :They are: CF75 and CFBF ===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.lede-project.org/t/support-for-d-link-dir-853/12674/4 ''Support for D-Link DIR-853'' on '''LEDE Project''' forums] :[https://gist.github.com/a2nt/10b96f421d18f501ed238a063601291e ''D-Link DIR-853 specs'' on '''GitHub'''] ===See also=== *[[D-Link DIR-853 rev A1]] *[[D-Link DIR-878 rev A1]] *[[D-Link DIR-882 rev A1]] __NOTOC__
